EVGate.purpose: Filters trades with negative expected value
EVGate.impact: Prevents taking -EV bets that would hurt long-term growth

TierFilter.impact: CRITICAL - WR drops from 78% to 63% without this

OddsFilter.purpose: Avoid extreme odds with poor risk/reward

MaxTradesPerCycle.impact: Quality over quantity - ensures best signal taken

noEVGate.result: Same trades executed - EV gate mainly catches edge cases

maxTradesPerCycle3.result: Same as allTiers - overtrading destroys profitability

recommendation.rationale: Current gates are correctly calibrated. Removing any significantly hurts performance.
